title: The Unexpected Hero: The Adventures of Victor Price
summary: Victor Price, a 62-year-old retired programmer who enjoys counseling, discovers his ability to manipulate digital realities, using his powers to save his city from cyber threats. Throughout one week, his journey transforms from an ordinary retiree into a superhero.
summaryGerman: Victor Price, ein 62-jähriger pensionierter Programmierer, der Freude am Beraten hat, entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, digitale Realitäten zu manipulieren, und nutzt seine Kräfte, um seine Stadt vor Cyberbedrohungen zu schützen. Innerhalb einer Woche verwandelt sich seine Reise von einem gewöhnlichen Rentner in einen Superhelden.
summaryDutch: Victor Price, een 62-jarige gepensioneerde programmeur die geniet van counselling, ontdekt zijn vermogen om digitale realiteiten te manipuleren, waarbij hij zijn krachten gebruikt om zijn stad te redden van cyberdreigingen. Gedurende één week verandert zijn reis van een gewone gepensioneerde naar een superheld.
summaryFrench: Victor Price, un programmeur retraité de 62 ans qui aime le conseil, découvre sa capacité à manipuler les réalités numériques, utilisant ses pouvoirs pour sauver sa ville des menaces cybernétiques. Tout au long d'une semaine, son parcours se transforme d'un retraité ordinaire en un super-héros.

story.text: Victor Price begins his week feeling rather peaceful, indulging in his hobby of programming. Unexpectedly, he stumbles upon a mysterious code that grants him the ability to manipulate digital environments.
Excited and energetic, Victor spends the day experimenting with his newfound powers, inadvertently stopping a small-scale digital theft.
Victor confides in a close friend about his abilities. Feeling a mix of eerie and triumphant emotions, he contemplates the potential of his powers.
Victor grows more confident and decides to take a proactive stance. He uses his skills to uncover and thwart a cyber attack aimed at the city's infrastructure, feeling extremely triumphant.

News of a mysterious 'cyber guardian' begins to circulate, making Victor feel a bit uneasy but still proud of his actions. His day is marked by a strange blend of romantic nostalgia as he recalls his days as a young programmer.
Victor spends a peaceful day counseling young programmers, educating them on the importance of ethical hacking and security, feeling happy and fulfilled.
Reflecting on the week, Victor feels an epic sense of duty and purpose. He commits to using his powers for the good of his city and perhaps, the world.

ending: And thus, Victor Price transformed from a retired programmer to the protector of digital realms, finding new purpose in his golden years.
moral: No matter the age, everyone has the potential to make a significant impact.
